mapper.select: SELECT A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(A.NOTICE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD') AS NOTICE_DATE , E.MEMBER_ID , C.FUNDING_CODE FROM TBL_FUNDING_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_FUNDING C ON( A.FUNDING_CODE = C.FUNDING_CODE) JOIN TBL_SELLER D on (C.SELLER_CODE = D.SELLER_CODE) JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON (E.MEMBER_CODE = D.MEMBER_CODE)
